channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenStack Platform 16.2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenStack Platform 16.2

item.title: CVE-2022-3261|2024-08-03T01:07:05.557Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20openstack%20platform%2016.2
item.description: A flaw was found in OpenStack. Multiple components show plain-text passwords in /var/log/messages during the OpenStack overcloud update run, leading to a disclosure of sensitive information problem.

item.title: CVE-2024-4840|2024-08-02T16:14:27.488Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20openstack%20platform%2016.2
item.description: An flaw was found in the OpenStack Platform (RHOSP) director, a toolset for installing and managing a complete RHOSP environment. Plaintext passwords may be stored in log files, which can expose sensitive information to anyone with access to the logs.

item.title: CVE-2024-4840|2024-05-30T23:06:12.172Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20openstack%20platform%2016.2
